mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, AA.* FROM (SELECT * FROM "FILE" ORDER BY FILEID DESC) AA) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "FILE" (FILEID, SUBJECT, USERNAME, CONTENT, NOTICE, IP, USERID) VALUES (FILE_FILEID_SEQ.nextval, #{subject}, #{userName}, #{content}, #{notice}, #{ip}, #{userID})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "FILE" WHERE notice = 'true' ORDER BY FILEID DESC
